    • Constructor Detail

      • GameThread

        public GameThread(AbstractGame game,
          GLView glView,
          EngineLock engineLock)
        Creates a new GameThread. The max number of FPS the game will be able to run at is 30 by default and the max number of frames that will be updated before rendering once in case performance is bad is 5 by default.
        Parameters:
        game - Game that this thread will manage.
        glView - GLView where the Game is rendered.
        engineLock - EngineLock used to synchronize both threads.

      • GameThread

        public GameThread(int maxFPS,
          AbstractGame game,
          GLView glView,
          EngineLock engineLock)
        Creates a new GameThread. The max number of frames that will be updated before rendering once in case performance is bad is 5 by default.
        Parameters:
        maxFPS - Max number of FPS the game will be able to run at.
        game - Game that this thread will manage.
        glView - GLView where the Game is rendered.
        engineLock - EngineLock used to synchronize both threads.

      • GameThread

        public GameThread(int maxFPS,
          int maxSkippedFrames,
          AbstractGame game,
          GLView glView,
          EngineLock engineLock)
        Creates a new GameThread.
        Parameters:
        maxFPS - Max number of FPS the game will be able to run at.
        maxSkippedFrames - Max number of frames that will be updated before rendering once in case performance is bad.
        game - Game that this thread will manage.
        glView - GLView where the Game is rendered.
        engineLock - EngineLock used to synchronize both threads.

        run in interface Runnable

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the GameThread.

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Terminates the GameThread. This method should be called from the UI thread before the activity is destroyed.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses the GameThread.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resumes the GameThread.
